param.name: threadsToShow
param.label: Number of threads to show?
param.description: Number of threads you want to show

param.name: showType
param.label: Show latest active threads or latest opened threads?
param.description: Choose if you want to show the latest active threads (ie., threads containing the latest replies) or the latest threads that have been created, regardless of their being replied to or not

param.name: forbiddenThreads
param.label: Id(s) of protected forum(s). Separate multiple ids with a comma.
param.description: Write the id(s) of the protected forums (ex. forum only admins can see). If left blank, threads' titles are shown regardless of forum properties!

param.name: moduleStyle
param.label: CSS class for module
param.description: CSS class assigned to the element

param.name: imagePath
param.label: Image used in thread list. Upload your image in default joomla! directory (images/stories/) and enter here filename only (ex. myImage.jpg)
param.description: Add an image to the list. Please upload image in default's joomla! directory images/stories/ and enter the file name only, ex. 'myimage.jpg'. If left blank, no image will be used. Accepted extensions are *.jpg,*.png,*.gif,*.bmp

param.name: showLink
param.label: Add link to forum threads
param.description: Choose if you want to link to the threads

param.name: forumUrl
param.label: MyBB forum URL. Read tooltip description for full instructions
param.description: Enter the URL of your forum starting with 'http://' and ending with a trailing slash, ex. 'http.//www.mysite.com/forum/'. If no URL is entered, the most common situation, ie. 'http://www.myjoomlasite.com/forum/' will be assumed

param.name: mybbTable
param.label: mybb table prefix
param.description: Prefix for mybb table. Default is mybb_
